name: UNAuthorizationOptions
desc: Constants for requesting authorization to interact with the user.

items.name: badge
items.desc: The ability to update the appâ€™s badge.

items.name: carPlay
items.desc: The ability to display notifications in a CarPlay environment.

items.name: criticalAlert
items.desc: The ability to play sounds for critical alerts.

items.name: providesAppNotificationSettings
items.desc: An option indicating the system should display a button for in-app notification settings.

items.name: provisional
items.desc: The ability to post noninterrupting notifications provisionally to the Notification Center.

items.name: announcement
items.desc: The ability for Siri to automatically read out messages over AirPods.

items.name: supportsContentExtensions
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the current device supports notification content extensions.
